channel.title: TGaceAllStories
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from TGaceAllStories, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Stock futures fall for a second day as rates continue to back up: Live updates
item.description: The Dow Jones Industrial Average snapped a three-day winning streak.

item.title: Harris, Liz Cheney tour battleground states to reach Republicans down on Trump
item.description: Kamala Harris and Liz Cheney held moderated conversations across the "Blue Wall" states of Pennsylvania, Michigan and Wisconsin.

item.title: Citi has a new theory about the economy — and says investors should pick stocks that can stand on their own
item.description: Strategists at Citi like companies where there are positive trends on return on equity that are driven by operations instead of buybacks.

item.title: ‘I wish Dad were here’: I received $500,000 after my late father’s wrongful-death lawsuit. My adviser suggests annuities. How do I invest it?
item.description: “I do not want incredibly high-risk investments. I want moderate risk, but something statistically stable.”

item.title: My sisters want to hide $170,000 of our mother’s money from Medicaid by adding their names to her bank account. What should I do?
item.description: “The probate attorney says I could ask the court to remove sister No. 3 as co-executor, since she has acted unethically and illegally.”

item.description: Donald Trump regularly lobs the unproven claim that Vice President Kamala Harris is lying about working at McDonald's in her 20s.

item.title: World’s largest sovereign wealth fund posts $76 billion in quarterly profit as interest rates fall
item.description: Norway's gigantic sovereign wealth fund on Tuesday reported third-quarter profit of 835 billion Norwegian kroner ($76.3 billion).

item.title: 10-year Treasury yield climbs above 4.2% after Fed officials' commentary
